init.description:
Set the options for the SmartCocoon: 
 • Preset modes (auto, eco) do not translate well in Apple Home, if you prefer to use these modes, enable them here.
 • Connection Check Interval: How often to check if fans are connected (1-60 minutes). Default: 60 minutes.
 • Max Offline Duration: How long to keep attempting to reconnect a fan before stopping recovery attempts (1-168 hours). Default: 24 hours.
 • Recovery Attempt Interval: How often to attempt recovery for disconnected fans (1-60 minutes). Default: 5 minutes.
 • Max Recovery Attempts Per Hour: Maximum recovery attempts per hour before reset (1-20 attempts). Default: 5 attempts.
 • Recovery Reset Interval: How often to reset the recovery attempt counter (15-240 minutes). Default: 60 minutes.
init.title: SmartCocoon Options
